name: Raw Nerve
description:
Drive this truckin’ weird and wild world of jumps, traverses and winding ascents. Uncover artifacts, help build the sonic landscape, conquer the summit, and try to clock the fastest time.



• A sandbox of hidden paths, cutty jumps and sonic artifacts.


• Discover shortcuts to clock the best time to the finish line.


• Use checkpoints as your guide or just go exploring.


• It’s a vibrant and psychedelic drive.
